revised_title: Further Investigations on the Chemical Composition of Lichens
tldr: The author investigates the chemical composition of two lichen varieties, Roccella tinctoria and Roccella fucifornis, focusing on their proximate principles and the formation of erythrin, orsellinic acid, and erythroglucine. The study confirms Dr. Schunck's hypothesis regarding the relationship between these compounds and provides insights into their formation and properties.
